document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
Crimea
: 1 spec. ( KUMN )
16 km S Bilohirsk
, env. of Krasnoselovka , on willows, S. Medvedev leg.,
14.vi.1957
;
1 spec. ( KUMN ) Bakhchisarai Distr. , Mizhhiria , Bartenev leg.,
29.vi.1985
;
13 spec. ( KUMN ) ca.
5 km N Pybachij
, Urochyshche Chiginitra ,
on Salix
sp., N. Yunakov leg.,
3.v.1998
;
Kharkiv Prov.
: 2 spec. ( KUMN ) 15 km S
Kharkiv , env. of Konstantovka [former Konstantinovka ], Donets-Zakharzhevski leg.
;
1 spec. ( KUMN )
5 km SWW Chugujev
, env. of Dachi railway platform, mixed forest, N. Yunakov leg.,
18.v.1998
;

Kherson Prov.
: 1 spec. ( KUMN ) env. Golaja Pristan , Kardashinskoe swamp, meadow on willows, S. Medvedev leg.,
7.vi.1951
;
Luhansk Prov.
: 1 spec. ( KUMN ) 20 km NNE
Luhansk , env. of Nizhneteploe , floodplain of Siverskyi Donets River ,
on Salix viminalis, S. Medvedev
leg.,
31.v.1953
;
2 spec. ( KUMN ) ca.
10 km SSW Milove
, Streltsovsky Step Nature Reserve , floodplains, evening, in the shadow between trees, Shapiro leg.,
22.v.1949
;

Rivne Prov.
: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Sarny Distr. ,
9 km NE Klesiv
, Somyne Lake , sweeping on Ledum palustre, V.Yu. Nazarenko leg.,
14.vi.2008
;
Sumy Prov.
: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Lebedyn Distr. , between Druzhne and Stepove , V . Yu. Nazarenko leg.,
20.viii.2009
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Seredyna-Buda Distr. , Stara Huta , swamp, sweeping, V . Yu. Nazarenko leg.,
20.vi.2006
;
1 spec. ( SIZK ) idem, willows, sweeping, V . Yu. Nazarenko leg.,
21.vi.2006
;

Zakarpatska Prov. :
1 spec. ( KUMN ) ca.
15 km SE Mizhhiria
, env. of Kalachava ,
on
Corylus avellana , Ananjev
leg.,
27.vi.1995
.
